post.body: thanks! can't wait to bring him home
thanks! so excited (feeling like a 5 year old right now)
sounds like heaven to me
have you read Approval Addiction yet?
both of the ones you're working are awesome!
i LOVE her books. just read 100 ways to simplify your life. good stuff!
i aim to entertain. works out well then :)
never had a hound before; but dh has. my cats are in for a rude awakening
thanks. i melted as soon as i saw them!
@curiouschild thanks. can't wait!
black and tan coonhound. one of these: http://is.gd/b1eB
you sound more like me everyday
not too much. u?
hey there!
i know. i just hate all the technical stuff that goes with it.
i took her in. no cold or other symptoms. just says her ear hurts. she has an appt later
well i'm glad you're okay. not a great way to start the day. hope it gets better from here
i think there is no such thing as a reasonable to do list :)
bingo
making progress slowly but surely
i prefer check boxes... makes me feel like i've accomplished something when i check it off :)
absolutely. amazes me every day!
mine too. i swear it laughs at me too
it's an internal tool specifically built for one of my clients. sorry...
ROIE
awesome story. just read your post. happy birthday to you son!
oh yeah. no fun. but she's definitely on the mend
im hearing rumors that they are thinking of cancelling heroes. say it ain't so!!
i know! are you a heroes fan? i saw scrubs moved to ABC. what's going on??
and thanks for asking!
you are the winner :)
you're so welcome steve. hope everyone enjoys it!!
probably safer that way
my son asks for "something funny" on youtube every morning. he's 3. loves the cat vs printer video
i have two. if i ever see one in my house i'll be super upset. but for right now, it's just in the garage
They gross me out. eewwwwwwwwwww :)
thanks!
lol. don't do that. it'll screw up your system. plus the tweeting you would do would clog up my tweetdeck :)
fantastic. a bit shocked that we're almost on the new year already. other than that, great. how about you?
good morning!
thought you might want to see this. http://tinyurl.com/63uhf8
morning!
i have two. a 5 year old and a 3 year old. just one of those days when insomnia led to productivity.
no. i try and hold off until 4 pm. that's what insomnia gets you these days
merry christmas if i don't talk to you before
i'll be definitely checking it out
we could have a coyote campout! how much fun would that be? um, ok, maybe not. lol!
must have been your charm
aw thanks *blushes*
lol no! but maybe i should let her know about the local pack around here, huh?
hi. i'm doing well. how about you?
i know EXACTLY what you are talking about.
and very weird, no? and they are the kind that stick with you all day. so strange...
we're in the same time zone. and that is weird, though i can't say i've never had the same experience :)
not bad at all. technically it's a vacation day, but go figure i'm working :)
good morning. how's it going in your neck of the woods?
here as in around my neighborhood. I live in a pretty rural part of ohio west of cleveland. not outside my window thank goodness!
morning early bird. what time is it where you are?
confirmed: we pick up our puppy on saturday!
contemplating a makeover for one of my blogs. decisions, decisions...
rain just turned to snow...
my happiness at completing an item off my to-do list is always so short lived. sigh...
catching up on emails and trying to outline a reasonable to-do list. a daunting task for sure
good morning kids. happy it's friday but wondering what happened to the rest of my week?!?
learning a new analytics program via a webinar
oh firefox. i love you more everyday... you make my life so easy
mega brainstorm this morning is leading to some organizational work in my department. planning for 2009 and getting a bit excited
RT @Andrew303: The CEO of NBC talks about redefining the broadcast TV model and avoiding the mistakes of Newspapers http://is.gd/b9Ba
nothing like an empty inbox. any takers on how long it takes to fill up again?
RT @steveouch: I was just interviewed by ANGELA MOORE! She put it up on the blog: http://ping.fm/dmO4E
evaluating tons of sites today. feeling a brainstorm coming on. look out...
RT @davesnyder: Great post by @lorenbaker about relationship building and the role it plays in link building http://zi.ma/bffbd7
wow. was just totally just sapped of any and all energy. coffee pot, here i come...
saw a mouse in my garage this morning (shudders)
he's good. still adjusting. but all in all he's good.
preparing to run lots of reports today. feels like i just did this :)
RT @fabrichound: check out this interview I did with @amcmoore for her craft blog! http://tinyurl.com/8t2ot4
almost 10 am and i've been working for 6 hours already. wow
RT @wiep Taking the Link Building Style Quiz - http://tinyurl.com/53fznv My style is director style
i can hear a pack of coyotes howling here. kinda creepy but kinda cool at the same time.
